I stopped keeping this site up-to-date many years ago, so if you've ended up here I'm afraid there's nothing to see any more.

For the sake of posterity here are the news stories that appeared from 1997 to 2006...

 

 

28 Mar 1999

THREE 2-2'S IN A ROW

Yeltz 2 Bath 2

Another game,and another point nearer safety. It all sounds a bit, but watching the mighty Yeltz isat the moment, with brilliant attacking being cancelled out by some less than brilliant defending.

 

 

20 Mar 1999

SIX WITHOUT DEFEAT

Ilkeston 2 Yeltz 2

The Mighty Yeltz continue their gradual climb to safety with, this time against high-flying Ilkeston.

 

 

14 Mar 1999

STUCK IN THIS LEAGUE FOR ANOTHER YEAR

Yeltz 2 Weymouth 2

Despite bravely fighting back from two goals down, it's nowfor The Mighty Yeltz.

 

 

06 Mar 1999

THE DOOR'S NOT COMPLETELY SHUT

Yeltz 3 Dorchester 1

Theas anothermeans we can still catch leaders Nuneaton - with 10 games to gothem in.

 

 

27 Feb 1999

I THINK I NEED A LIE DOWN

WORCESTER 3 YELTZ 4

I'm not sure I can cope with this!, 10 goals in all with an incredible 7 from.

With several teams below us also winning it's crucial we keep this winning run going next week against Dorchester.

 

 

20 Feb 1999

THAT WAS JUST BRILLIANT!

Salisbury 1 Yeltz 2

In one of the tensest games for many a while,battled to a brilliant victory against a Salisbury team that had previously gone 12 games unbeaten.

 

 

13 Feb 1999

WOO-HOO!

Yeltz 4 Rothwell 0

This was awin in our relegation battle. A loss would have dropped us into the relegation zone, but two goals from youngand another two fromhas moved us up a couple of places in theto a whopping 16th.

 

 

06 Feb 1999

A LINE HAS BEEN DRAWN

Merthyr 1 Yeltz 0

I've had enough now. It's desperation time after another loss in the League, so it's time to get out your, good-luck charms, whatever... the line HAS been drawn -.

 

 

30 Jan 1999

AAAAAAAAHHHH!

Yeltz 0 Gloucester 1

A rusty-looking Yeltz dropped to onlywith a very depressing 1-0 loss at home to Glouceter.

GLAD YOU FOUND US!

No game cos' we'd already played it

Welcome to the new, slightly more exciting world of. I hope you found it OK - I won't be updating the old site any more so if you couldetc. to here now I'd be much obliged.

 

 

16 Jan 1999

WARTHOGS ON THE PITCH

Yeltz P Ilkeston P

Themeant we cleverly made several of our relegation rivals use up one of their games in hand as. We haven't got a game next week either, so things should be a bit clearer by the time.

 

 

12 Jan 1999

NO MORE CUPS THIS CENTURY

BSC Yeltz 1 Wolves 2

It was nice while it lasted, but our glorious reign as theended with a. They scored the winner in the last minute, with the Yeltz goal coming from. That's us out of all the cups now, so we can concentrate on achieving a nice, safe mid-table position in the League (please!)

01 Jan 1999

WHAT A YEAR!

Yeltz 2 Nuneaton 0

Perhaps we've turned the corner. In a fantastic start to 1999,in front a bumper holiday crowd of 1521,- following a brilliant in the 14th minute - and a late clincher fromin injury-time after their keeper had been sent off.

22 Dec 1998

ALL WE WANT FOR XMAS IS ...

19 Dec 1998

THE GREAT ESCAPE

Yeltz 3 Salisbury 3

A day later and I'm still confused whether to be pleased or not. To come back from 3 behind with only 20 minutes to go is brilliant, but let's not kid ourselves - it was a relegation battle that we needed to win.

After a couple of clean sheets we hoped the defensive problems had been sorted out, but we gifted themall three goals with sloppy marking. They must have been feeling sorry for us as they leftcompletely open for our first, and thenscored a beauty.

 

 

12 Dec 1998

SOLID

Bath 0 Yeltz 0

Another clean sheet and another point, but this time it was a very creditable 0-0 draw away to second placed Bath. They'd only let in one goal in the last 7 games, and had won their last 5 home games, so this was an excellent result.
